Room.Name: Ashton River Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the east bank of the Ashton River, on a wide dirt road.
Room.LongDescription: Further north, the road has been washed out, but through the woods to the east you can see a strange sight... There's a house built on a canopy of ropes strung between the trees! It seems to be swaying gently in the strong breeze coming from the mountains, creaking as it flexes on its odd foundation. A rope ladder hangs to the ground.
